name: Nature`s Secrets Aloe Vera Hair Gel
description: Flexibility and frizz control at their best! Rest assured this is the hair gel of choice: be it for a neater or wet look, or to manage curls or add shine to straight hair. Hydrate and nourish your hair while reducing the risk of dandruff with all natural Aloe Vera. Suitable for men & women. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
